website_summaries.verdict: An attractive dual flush toilet with an ultra-modern look.
pros: Uses very little water but still has a powerful flush
Pairs with bidet from same maker (separate purchase)
cons: The toilet is very heavy and may be difficult to install

customer_reviews.title: Beware!!! Weak flush - DO NOT PURCHASE.  YOU WILL REGRET IT
customer_reviews.text: Toilet flush is the weakest of any toilet I have ever seen. Do not buy this toilet unless you want to use the toilet brush to clean it everyday as you need to flush it 2x or 3x to clear the contents of the toilet bowl. Pretty design, but pathetic that it flushes so weakly. Was charged $58 to return it too! In between the waiting to ship, the cost to install/uninstall, and the insult of charging me to return it...this was a $350 mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Musa Ali

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY IF YOU LIVE IN MASS- does not pass plumbing  inspection
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful looking toilet! Great power. My plumber said tricky to get in. However, once in lovely. Well- the inspector came and guess what? THIS DOES NOT PASS MASSACHUSETTS inspection! When I called the company back multiple times- they didn't answer, messages not returned. Finally got someone and they said "not sure about product code" will look into it and call back. No call back. Called again- same response. Talked to plumbing inspector(s) and general building inspector-- doesn't pass in MASS. Sadly! Plumber now going to have to come back out to un-install, and amazon would like it "returned." The used toilet, eeeee- that would be fun to re-sell :-(
customer_reviews.author: Haley Claflin

customer_reviews.title: Toilet bowl is cracking!
customer_reviews.text: I noticed a line in our brand new toilet bowl maybe a month ago that was barely noticeable and it caused me no concern at the time since I was too busy helping to plan my dad's funeral. I was quite alarmed this morning when I was cleaning the bowl! The crack is now very noticeable and much longer. (The picture does not do it justice) I am beyond the return window from Amazon and was advised to call the source, which I did. It said to press 0 for operator, but there was no one there and then it said to press 1 for customer service and there was no one there as well! pfffft
customer_reviews.author: debsdunit

customer_reviews.title: False descriptions on the product, bad customer  services.
customer_reviews.text: The description falsely claimed this toilet is alllultra quiet when flushing. The flushing noise actually quite loud! I have one piece toilet and it is much more quiet. It is too much trouble to return this heavy toilet, so I think I am stuck with it. Customer support is terrible. I called to ask for assistance in adjusting the water level in the bowl. The rep told me to refer to the manual. She tried to get me off the phone by giving me some brief answers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: couldn't ask for a better product!  Great in every way!
customer_reviews.text: This toilet has all great features and qualities. It came well packaged without a chance of breaking. I was a little bit worried about the flush mechanism and ease of replacement parts, but it's good quality and easily available with the 1 800 number on the warranty card. Great "Throne"!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Delivery from Amazon took almost 2 weeks;Prime member, but was worth the wait and very happy with product.Some Answers worth noting; This T-0019 model is a bright white as in porcelain white which I like.Floor to top of porcelain=16.25'' Add appx.1''for seat.My floor bolts were standard 12'' from wall. Installed toilet came within .25'' from wall, someone obviously done the math.Flush is all about water conservation ;short but effective.And yes the 2 holdown screws were the most difficult task.Small space with sharp angles. Special socket wrench included helps a lot.You will tighten using your fingertips but can be done and the rest is a breeze.The flush mechanism looks complex;hope it never breaks! Looks great,contempory look.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The seats not heated but you can purchase it with a heated seat!
customer_reviews.text: My 96 year young mother in-law absolutely loves the toilet. It flushes great with all the pressure to flush down those items you have deposited into the quick! Well with two flush settings one for that quick flush of liquids and the second button for that heavy stuff. The toilet stays very clean and has not required multiple flushes as the old system needed. The seat that comes with it is very comfortable and my mother-in-law really likes that we are spoiling her with things she never thought of! We are looking at getting another one for another room we liked it so much! A quality system and with a updated look that is easier to keep clean!
customer_reviews.author: Gale

customer_reviews.title: Their engineer stopped short of a good product
customer_reviews.text: I am a tall man and was looking for a tall toilet. This t-0019 was advertised as a 19" tall toilet in contrast to their T-0001 toilet which was the normal 16.5" tall. I ordered the T-0019 but the toilet that I received was shorter than the 17" high toilet that I have now. Deceptive advertising. The clean-ability looks good from the photos supplied by the manufacturer. What they don't show is that their engineer neglected to think of a way to cover the hidden "nest" in the back of the toilet that would make a great home for bugs or even small animals. This could have been a good product if it were engineered to match the advertising claims.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hesitate.
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a basic bidet attachment with this. I am so glad I did. It’s very easy to install and it works well. I had to add an extension cord and find a way to hide the cord that goes from the right side of the toilet to the outlet above the left side of the sink. Totally worth the effort. Do we still use toilet paper? Yes. (mostly to completely dry off) Are our bottoms clean? Yes! Should you buy this? Absolutely.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Voorhees

customer_reviews.title: Great productm quick install
customer_reviews.text: With t/p being hard to find, my wife and I thought that this would be a good alternative. By researching, i discovered that this was available from Amazon, at a great price. Delivery was quick, and upon arrival and unpacking, it seemed to be a really quality item. Installation was quick and easy. (25 mins), and the remote did everything it was supposed to. We're really happy with this bidet seat.
customer_reviews.author: Tropoint

customer_reviews.title: Lookout Bio Bidet!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, had to temporarily replace my bio Bidet when it broke after just a few months. Since Bio-Bidet does not send a replacement and expects you to crap on the toilet bowl without a seat while you send your broken one to be fixed I purchased this one to use temporarily and then put in my guest bathroom. Well this one worked so much better that I kept it for my bathroom and ordered another for my guest bathroom and will most likely throw away my crappy BioBidet. The Woodbridge is a much better bidet, lower cost and much higher quality than the Bio-bidet.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Bad patch job leaking water!
customer_reviews.text: You should not sell a toilet that has a bad patch job. It is wasteful for me to spend so much money & time to hire plumber to uninstall& diagnose the issue. We found bad patch jobs with the hole (!) that is UNDERNEATH the bowl and leaking water. Unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Lan

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. Flushes Well. Inexpensive. What more could you want?
customer_reviews.text: Ok, if this came with a full pack of TP from Costco, it would be perfect. The skirt makes it a bit of a challenge to install (ok, it was a bit more difficult for the handyman to install and it needed a longer hook-up thingy). The description was perfect and spot-on so I could be sure that the "footprint" would be the same or exceed what I previously had. I love the design, height, and flush buttons. Easy to clean, completes it job every time and quiet. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: wassersimon

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and easy to use  though installation was a bit complex
customer_reviews.text: The seat install was a bit confusing. They indicate that the splitter is to be added to the angle valve but the thread size are made to directly attach to the toilet feed assembly. Once I figured that out I had to come up with a solution for the power cord. The length was not long enough for it to reach an existing power outlet so I had to create a new outlet and took power from the existing. That took care of all my issues. Now the seat works well and my wife and I are satisfied with its functionality.
customer_reviews.author: E. G. Karaganeas

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Really handsome toilet, nice low profile on the tank part, seems well built, flush seems powerful (and has two-level flush for #1 and #2). So far cleaning seems pretty straightforward. I really like it overall. My only concern is: when the seat cover is down and I sit on it, there is maybe too much flexibility, it sinks down some in the middle - not sure if it can really hold my weight (160 lbs.) I would prefer a sturdier-feeling seat cover.
customer_reviews.author: PIne Tree Man

customer_reviews.title: Love my toilet!
customer_reviews.text: I love this toilet. Really contemporary looking. Great height. In my opinion, for the couple of extra dollars it adds a lot of value to the bathroom. Easy to clean because of its shape. Makes an ordinary bathroom look higher end! Spend the extra $. My only complaint is that the toilet seat is higher than the back when lifted so I have to close the seat then flush....the good part about that is seat is always down...which always looks better!!!!
customer_reviews.author: islovin

customer_reviews.title: A Must
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I just don't like how when you lift the seat and tends to easily fall back. I'm sure just a few adjustments will do the trick, but it takes extra time to make it happen. I also wish it had an auto function like my other seat, but overall would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Nice toilet
customer_reviews.text: Love the looks, love the functionality, best flushing toilet I have ever used, comfortable to sit on, easy to use... only part that I hated is the difficulty to install. Had a very tight space and very difficult to get centered over the mounting bolts. Took numerous attempts to get to over the bolts without knocking from the toilet flange. Get long bolts that have a retainer washer to hold in upright position and use the molded rubber/plastic toilet ring versus the wax ring. Overall, great toilet.
customer_reviews.author: melinda

customer_reviews.title: Remote Issues
customer_reviews.text: I have loved this product, but recently the remote has started triple-beeping and not communicating properly with the unit. This error has removed so much of the functionality that makes this bidet so great. I am mad and tired. I have done everything independently to correct the error and I have had little to no success.
customer_reviews.author: WuLF0491

customer_reviews.title: Bought for Broken Back
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my bf who broke his back in a freak accident. Thought it would be easier for him, and we ended up all loving it. only 4 stars for install because I didn't do it, and it tends to slide around. That could be install error, needs adjustment, or because the way the power cord kind of pulls ( we need to get an extension cord) so it doesn't go across the whole bathroom. We tell all our friends about it and will never not own one of these again. Seriously!
customer_reviews.author: EL

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love love love, we bought this to fill a gap in the TP shortage and accommodate an older relative so they didn’t need to twist, turn and risk falling, but could retain some independence. It’s super easy to use with great features.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: A really nice toilet
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent toilet, both stylistically and functionally. Several reviews claimed that it was difficult to install. I had it installed professionally, and the plumbers said it wasn't a big deal. Supposedly it takes a custom toilet seat. Since I installed three of these toilets, I think I might buy a couple of extra seats and leave them in my garage.
customer_reviews.author: iDave

customer_reviews.title: Very efficient and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have a different brand bidet in my other home and this one seems to work much better. The only issue I had on installation is that the T adapter that came was 1/2" and not the standard 3/8" I had to do some rigging with a couple of trips to Lowes but once installed, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Pabon

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a friend. He’s got mobility issues (loss of range of motion on one side) and needs help with the process. This product allows him to have full independence with toileting. The remote is amazing because he can’t always reach the side control panels offered by most products (it’s always on his injured side). I’m a little jelly and would like one of my own; maybe in the future ;). The independence this provides for people with disabilities is unmatched. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Drea F

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value, but low pressure
customer_reviews.text: Every aspect of this bidet is great except for the water pressure. It's not an issue with our plumbing, we have other bidets that offer much greater water pressure. It's lower profile and doesn't dominate the entire opening of the toilet like some other models. It's not overly wide either, so it doesn't dominate the space. The fan and water can get quiet hot, so do watch out.
customer_reviews.author: ChiPolitico

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: The toilet was easy to install and looks very sleek. However on error I needed 4 toilets and did not notice a gliche that ordered 1 instead of 4 toilets and when I went to order 3 additional toilets the price was more expensive. I could not reach anyone at Amazon to see if they would honor the original price on the toilets so it is a bit frustrating . I am hopeful when Customer service at Amazon resumes normal hours they can honor the original price of the toilets.
customer_reviews.author: Constantina Poulos

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously difficult to install, and I'm a contractor
customer_reviews.text: Unnecessarily difficult to install. Why have me wrapping my arms awkwardly behind and INSIDE the fixture to install? Simply not worth the money and trouble just to have it easier to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Duke Jabroni

customer_reviews.title: Best one yet!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a BioBidet and wow, what a nice upgrade this unit is despite being better priced. More features, better design, great remote, easy install, high quality components. What's not to like?! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Xxzzy

customer_reviews.title: I JUST LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.text: THE WOODBRIDGE IS GORGEOUS, VERY FUNCTIONAL FLUSH, EASY TO CLEAN AND THE HEIGHT IS RIGHT. EVERY WOMEN WHO SEES MY NEW BATHROOM COMMENTS: I REALLY LIKE YOUR POTTY. PROBLEM: THE SEAT, IT HAS COME LOOSE AND WE DON'T KNOW HOW TO TIGHTEN IT, THEREFORE, I WILL CALL WOODBRIDGE OR ASK ON AMAZON. I JUST LOVE EVERYTHING ABOUT IT AND WOULDN'T CHANGE IT FOR THE WORLD.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Marie Waugh

customer_reviews.title: Nice toilet at a competitive price
customer_reviews.text: Full disclosure – we literally just installed this toilet an hour ago. The whole job took about two hours but that includes removing the old toilet cleaning the area and installation. It was a little tricky but we used some of the tips that others posted here. I won’t repeat them. The toilet looks great. Flushes great. I think it will be easy to clean. We are very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: hroceanlover

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Woodbridge bidet toilet seat. I’m always happy when something goes according to plan and this was the easiest seat to install. I did have to get two extra washers to use in order to tighten the mounting plate securely. I always have plenty of extra hardware around the house so that wasn’t a problem, but it would be nice if extra washers were included. I would give 5 stars but there is a stale odor since installed...literally one day after installation. If I leave a fan on at all times it’s not too bad....I’ll update if I find the reason for the smell (nope! It isn’t that! ).
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn

customer_reviews.title: Good for these days
customer_reviews.text: It gets the job done, but it’s kind of small, so if you have a big bottom, you may find it a bit uncomfortable. When the water squirts at first, it’s very surprising, so well, brace yourself lol! It takes a while to dry your bum though, and the wind is kind of cold. Still, I’m lucky I got this last year and installed it now, because it’s difficult to find toilet paper nowadays
customer_reviews.author: Gotta Have Prime

customer_reviews.title: An essential for that feeling of independence and well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't find anything that I didn't like.Being a disabled veteran and my wife going in for surgery soon.Figured I'd try. Not disappointed at all.I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Dunham

customer_reviews.title: Not for tight spaces
customer_reviews.text: If you are doing this yourself and cannot easily squeeze your body lying down between you current toilet and what is next to it, I would suggest getting something with less fashionable external bolts. I have less than a foot to the wall and cabinet, left and right, and squeeze and contort my arm to get the wrench on the bolt, no fun.
customer_reviews.author: SCK

customer_reviews.title: Trial and tribulatyions
customer_reviews.text: This is a great system for the price. Management reports that the three screens in the system are important to maintain clean water to seat. In order to keep toilet seat up, I had to change the cover of toilet tank in order to allow the seat to go back far enough to have seat stand on its own.. Would suggest that manufacturer put magnet in seat and cover to hold seat up. All and all would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: james h.

customer_reviews.title: It's a great deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: This bidet has a great set of features for the price. This is my first time to use or own a bidet so I'm not an expert. It fits my new Woodbridge T-0019 toilet beautifull and tours of new things in the house proudly includes the bathroom. The only thing I wish for is a little more water pressure. Overall I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sir Kilowatt

customer_reviews.title: fancy
customer_reviews.text: I got this bide because of the ratings. I really didn't think I needed all the bells and whistles. I like it. It could use a little more water pressure, and the seat is really small. If I could've tried it out first I probably wouldn't have bought it because of the size. But it all works pretty well. It does the job.
customer_reviews.author: E. Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I like this toilet a lot. Great price for what you get. Powerful flush - no issues at all. Only thing is the install, it is not meant for one person - you need 2 because of the bling alignment of the holes to blots. I just barley got it. Once in I’ve th ebook, exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Gojo

customer_reviews.title: Will not fit into corner with 12" rough in.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this toilet and the bidet on the advice from someone that indicated that it will fit into a corner with a 12" rough in. She did not know what she was talking about. IT DOES NOT. Had to cut slots into the wall for the corners of the toilet to fit into. Luckily I had done the walls in cedar an just had to cut the slots into the walls and put a frame around then to make it look decent. After all the hassle I love the unit. Like the first time I had AC. Could never be without it again.
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: 1 Big Con, good Price and value
customer_reviews.text: The plastic bidet seat doesn't fit most toilets great and has a tendency to move around over time making it feel flimsy. It hasn't broke or anything yet and it's been like 4 months. For the price and all the features, I'd still consider this a good buy and would do it again.
customer_reviews.author: BJ M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent toilet
customer_reviews.text: Excellent toilet. As discussed in many other posts, installation is a little tricky; definitely helps if you have 2 people. I used painters tape to mark the floor where the flange bolts were set and marked the sides of the toilet where the corresponding holes aligned. Took a few attempts, but ended uo being alot easier than I expected. Hooking up the water inlet to the toilet first is a good idea. Lowering on 2x4’s seems like a good option also. Fit and finish are excellent. Flush is strong, have experienced no clogs and no residual material in bowl. I don’t find the seat the most comfortable, but only a minor issue for me. Extremely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: GVRVandetta

customer_reviews.title: not to happy
customer_reviews.text: The 2 way connector should be a easier to connect to toilet fill valve, I had to by another toilet fill valve I think that the 3 way connector is not good I cant purchase another 3way connector they don't have it in Home Depot. I call customer service and cant even live a message because is full if the customer can call me I will appreciate, my phone number is 201-232-5211. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: dolman Garces

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and cool
customer_reviews.text: I'm thrilled to have my first skirted toilet! I will be switching all of mine eventually instead of cleaning the crevasses, which is gross and a big pain in the butt. The one thing I will say is make sure you have enough room on each side of the toilet to lie down to install. The hardest part is lining up the screws....but overall was pretty easy to install. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca G.

customer_reviews.title: It's a Functioning Work of Art!
customer_reviews.text: Not only does this crapper look like a work of art, but it also functions like one. Dual flush water saving, Soft Closing Toilet Seat, flushes the largest of loads without any effort, This is the Cadillac, all I need now is the bidet addition to make this the Rolls Royces of toilets! Five stars isn't enough it deserves 10 stars in my book!
customer_reviews.author: db49erfan1

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste your Money
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to purchase this toilet, but my plumber had the hardest time installing it. He had to purchase new washer the toilet leaked all the time. I wish I would have went to Home Depot or Lowes. Upset I can't return it because it took a long time to get my renovated bathroom complete, I missed the return window.
customer_reviews.author: L. Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Better than CoCo bidet
customer_reviews.text: Had CoCo bidet for years not as good of quality as WOODBRIDGE eg. the stainless steel nozzle as opposed to using a cheap plastic sprayer says it all. Though both have similar features the Woodbridge is in a class all its own. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rajun Cajun

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of problems with my hands so it has been a trial to keep myself clean. Now I don't have to do it, it is done automatically by this wonderful toilet seat! I love everything about it. You can't go wrong with this one and it will make your life cleaner and better.
customer_reviews.author: Lonifm

customer_reviews.title: It's good to be King
customer_reviews.text: From here I make my plans of world domination while giving out orders on who to tax more and who to execute. I just wish it had a hundred swords melted together for a backing to lean back on.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Delivery takes a long time.  Amazon is in no hurry.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this toilet on June 16, 2020. Scheduled for delivery on July 6 between 6 am and 6 pm and that we had to be home all day. Just received text today July 8th that company that is going to deliver is holding on to it until July 27th because there schedule is full.
customer_reviews.author: E.B.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and efficient
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I was going to say that about a toilet, but this thing looks nice :) You can definitely see that it doesn't waste water, and I like the fact the flush is silent. One thing that isn't great is the comfort - the seat is made of thin plastic, you may decide to change it later. I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Ok First off, I love it! It is easy to operate and does the job well. Downside was that it came with hoses that didnt fit and we had ti do a hardware store run to get what we needed. Also keep in mind the electric chord to plug it in is pretty short and we had to install an outlet behind the toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Tammie K. Stinchfield

customer_reviews.title: Looks great with Toto washlet
customer_reviews.text: tips for installation (what worked for me) -install the supply line to the toilet before installation -Use a couple spacers between the toilet and floor (I used a couple 2x4 pieces from my 2x4 jenga) -Install the wax ring on the floor not the toilet -once the toilet is lined up have someone help pull the 2x4s out and gently lower it into place Also this toilet looks great with our Toto washlet
customer_reviews.author: Chris S

customer_reviews.title: Tall toilet
customer_reviews.text: The toilet is very comfortable and is a good height. The toilet did not come with a wax ring and the person who installed it tried to just use grout to seal it properly. That doesn't work - it leaks. I recommend being sure you have the wax ring available at installation.
customer_reviews.author: OGL

customer_reviews.title: Nice seat, good price, good features, keeps your bum clean!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great seat for the product. I like everything about it and it works well to clean your bum. Only criticism is the mounting hardware is plastic so don't get too crazy sliding around on this seat as it will shift out of position.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Style and value
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful product, looks fabulous. Dual flush is great. Soft close lids work great. Height is perfect. Great value for a sleek toilet. Great value and style
customer_reviews.author: Jat

customer_reviews.title: Good looking toilet
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best looking toilet out there. Our contractor had quite a hard time installing it because it’s one piece and very heavy. But once installed, works so well and looks so good!
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Best Throne I have had
customer_reviews.text: This toilet has the perfect height and is very comfortable. The seat does not shift when you sit or rise and the soft close does not accidentally wake anyone at night. The 2 flush options help conserve water.
customer_reviews.author: Cedric L Teagler

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: This product is outstanding. It performs well and was a very easy install. The remote control is reliable and easy to use. You can easily switch between the his and her settings. There is a pressure sensor in the seat to ensure the unit will not be accidentally activated. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: charles b tyree

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, Crappy Flush
customer_reviews.text: Horrible weak flush. Bought this one because it advertised a powerful flush. Have to flush multiple times each time. Way overpriced for the cheap crappy flush it has
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: No flushing power.
customer_reviews.text: It looks sleek, but I feel very cheated. My main concern in buying this toilet was because it has flushing power. It clogged from the first use. This company is dishonest in its marketing of this toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Najwa

customer_reviews.title: Pain in the ass to install!
customer_reviews.text: Don't order this unless you have 4 feet on either side, otherwise you cannot get to the bolts, what a terrible design!
customer_reviews.author: James Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Stylish great quality toilet
customer_reviews.text: Great item needs two people to set into place & the more suround room the better but love everything about this toilet easy to clean super quiet .Soft close lid .Very stylish. Going to buy 2 more for my other bathrooms
customer_reviews.author: Donna S. Browne

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We had one from Coway installed by the distributor but it stopped working for a while. This time, I wanted to try installing it myself because electrical outlet is already therw from the previous installation. I am happy that I did. The product is great. Ask my wife.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great product.
customer_reviews.text: I love love my toilet! My contractor didn’t enjoy installing it as much. The seat comes completely off, making the task of cleaning so much easier now. It’s great for someone like myself who is OCD about cleanliness especially in the bathroom. It has two flush buttons on top. One for poo and the other for urine. The larger button is obviously a more powerful flush. I always use the this button regardless. The toilet seems to stay clean. Mostly. Surprisingly. I highly recommend this toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great toilet! Very happy with this purchase. Comfortable, and sleek style
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M. Carrigan

customer_reviews.title: A nightmare to install unless you have lots of room on both sides of the toilet.
customer_reviews.text: Once it is installed it is a very nice clean looking unit, and it flushes very quietly. Installation would not be near as difficult if you have room along the back wall next to the toilet to access the bolt.
customer_reviews.author: Diana H.

customer_reviews.title: Toilet
customer_reviews.text: Great toilet height for taller or elderly people. I love the streamline look and soft closing seat. This toilet also has great dual flushing, conserving water in our septic system.
customer_reviews.author: James Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Great design!
customer_reviews.text: Great toilet! Super nice design. Very difficult to install in a tight area but doable:) The template for positioning d toilet was uneven nd not usable. Very heavy since its one piece nd therefor more complicated to get in place, but doable!!! Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Javo

customer_reviews.title: Seat way off center
customer_reviews.text: Toilet arrived today and the seat was on incorrectly. Way off center. And it isn’t loose so somebody put it on wrong. Hesitant to remove and recenter for fear of stripping screws and potentially ruining the seat. Disappointing to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great toilet. Easy to install and nice modern look.
customer_reviews.text: Great toilet. Easy to install and nice modern look. Disappointed it is made in China and seller did not tell us. I hope Woodbridge can have them made somewhere else in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Rumely

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tolite
customer_reviews.text: Love the style and design. Easy to install. Shipping can be an issue once it gets to your local area however that is not AMAZON or manufactures fault. Would recommend this item
customer_reviews.author: KTowns

customer_reviews.title: Very modern toilet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toilet for a bath remodeled it gave a complete new modern look to the bath. I love the stylish line, which makes it easy to clean. This is a 17” comfortable height. It came with the toilet cover and dual flush bottom with water savings option.
customer_reviews.author: aco

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful style, hard to properly install
customer_reviews.text: Not easy to install at all. Couldn't reach the screws to tighten it down all the way. Now it wobbles when sitting and standing.. Disappointing. Love the push button flush and the height.
customer_reviews.author: hijenist

customer_reviews.title: Great value dual flush
customer_reviews.text: Love that is has a solid front base... used a professional to install... looks like the bolts had to be secured from the back.. but looks fantastic, better price for dual flush than the big chain stores. Delivered to the foyer of my home!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine H.

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for the metal Tee connector
customer_reviews.text: The Tee connector has male 7/8" with only 2 threads, and made out of metal. This end is installed on to the bottom of the tank fitting which is made from plastic. It will leak. I had to buy another Tee with plastic 7/8" with deeper housing (more threads). This new Tee connector works perfect
customer_reviews.author: dbuckius

customer_reviews.title: manufacturing defect found after return deadline
customer_reviews.text: after replacing wax seal 3 times I realized I had a manufacturing defect and toilet was leaking from the front inside not the wax seal and had to be caulked inside with professional grade silicone to stop the leaking I am past the return date now and will contact seller for a replacement
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction
customer_reviews.text: I have always had toto's but thought I'd give it a try after all the good reviews. We really like this toliet. Great flushing even on 1.3 gallons. No so sticking gross things. Very solid construction.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Gallo

customer_reviews.title: Great Product overall
customer_reviews.text: I am really enjoying this product! The only downsides of this item are the installation process that requires a strong person or 2, being 1 piece is like 120lb, and the other downside is that the lid even if looks very nice is attached by 2 cheap-looking plastic fasteners that need to be screwed and I have a strong feeling that is going to be a problem in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: jenny

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable height for adults
customer_reviews.text: Toilet itself is the best, installation is a easy, it comes with everything you need to install. The toilet comes assembled . The toilet had a great flush system, it's silent and very efficient, we love the look, it brings a new style to our bathroom. You will not find this quality of product for the price in any local store
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Hiney’s clean.
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. Working super good. Great night light. Heated seat my Hiney is happy. Way less toilet paper use too.
customer_reviews.author: Phildmover

customer_reviews.title: Clean lines and seamless look
customer_reviews.text: Great value for a clean seamless look in any bathroom. Love the full skirt so no dust accumulates on back under piping.
customer_reviews.author: Gfr16

customer_reviews.title: No issues no problems. 5 star
customer_reviews.text: Guy we paid to install said it was very easy. Toilet has great flush. Very quiet. Overall seems like great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: A good product, competitively priced. Instructions were in weird chinglish (crudely translated from another language ) But doable. Worked well.
customer_reviews.author: exctyengr

customer_reviews.title: Clean lines with great flushing capabilities...
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love this toilet. It has the best clean lines I have ever seen. I watched my plumbers install it and it took less that 3 minutes. Its flushing capabilities are great and cleaning is a breeze. Well work the $ paid for this toilet. I will buy another one when we renovate the powder room next year.
customer_reviews.author: SD

customer_reviews.title: BID 01 - Bidet seat
customer_reviews.text: This review is for the BID-01 Bidet seat. The square that the seat connect to; the serrated piece does not lock very well.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Test before you buy
customer_reviews.text: The flushing power is lacking. There’s no way the “results” are reaching the main sewer line. I anticipate plumbing issues literally down the line.
customer_reviews.author: Richard H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice toilet
customer_reviews.text: Sleek lines, love the soft close lid but this is tough to install because the bolts are hidden deep inside the base of the toilet- be sure to have a hand mirror or cell phone to help line up the bolts to the floor and toilet. Overall great value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: The product was not easy to install. I had to get a plumber to do it. However, it works well. I don't use the dryer function because it takes too long. I also like the light which illuminates the toilet bowl at night.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toilet
customer_reviews.text: Like dual flush and single construction but best is comfort height
customer_reviews.author: Judith Cummins

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, a breeze to install
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, a breeze to install. Seems to work very nicely. Time will tell. Just installed it. If problems arise I will edit this review.
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: Feel like I threw my money away
customer_reviews.text: Too bulky, the seat is very uncomfortable and narrow. I don't like it. It is easy to install and we enjoy talking about when people come over.
customer_reviews.author: Beanie

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Item was received quickly. Have used for about a month without any problems. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M

customer_reviews.title: Need installation by experienced plumber
customer_reviews.text: I love the look, dual flushing system and easiness to clean. It needs to be tightened to the floor when installing, so that it doesn't move. As always got a lot of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Modern , great flush power.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these toilets. Smart looking , modern , great flush power
customer_reviews.author: IAN LEWIS

customer_reviews.title: Good modern bidet.
customer_reviews.text: The night light feature on this bidet is great.After some research figured out how the nozzle self cleaned. Installation was easy I personally found the wash pressure to be a little low, others may find it fine. My wife says the feminine spray pressure is just right.
customer_reviews.author: malcolm

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: Never ordered a toilet online but I really liked the features of this one. It arrived no problems and looks awesome
customer_reviews.author: Jim Broadway

customer_reviews.title: Great look.
customer_reviews.text: Love the looks and ease of cleaning. Flushes with no splashing.
customer_reviews.author: DonnaDav

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and price
customer_reviews.text: Really good toilet I'm a professional plumber for over 16 years this is a very solid and good toilet specially for the price highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Lulzim Marku

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: Not that bad to install. install hose to toilet first, cut out the template and mark the floor. I used a furniture dolly to get it close. one or two people lift the toilet and one pull it out. A ratchet wrench works best to tighten, don't over tighten.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great for small space
customer_reviews.text: This toilet has clean lines and looks good in a small space. Only negative is our plumber said difficult to hook up because the lines are in the back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: WOODBRIDGE T-0019 Cotton White toilet | Modern Design, One Piece, Dual Flush
product_meta.description: Style:T-0019| Pattern Name:Toilet"Dual Flush Elongated One Piece Toilet with Soft Closing Seat and Round Button "Luxurious Modern Design: Clean, sleek look and compliment with different styles like modern, craftsman, traditional and etc. Easy-to-Clean Design: The skirted trap way creates a sleek look and makes cleaning easier. Compare to other toilets, it has no corners and grooves, very easy to reach for cleaning, not like others hard to reach Dual Flush System Design: 1. 0 /1. 6 GPF, average at 1. 28 gallon flush Siphon Flushing Design: Fully glazed flush system, bringing a super quiet and powerful flushing - NO clogs, NO leaks, and NO problem Comfort Height Design: Chair-height seating that makes sitting down and standing up easier for most adults All-in-One Package Design: Includes toilet, pre-installed soft closing toilet seat, high quality wax ring, floor bolts, and installation instruction High-end Soft Closing Seat with Stainless Steel Durable Seat Hinge: Easy to get the toilet seat off to tighten or clean after years of use Easy installation Design: Include special hand wrench tool to easily tighten the bolts in narrow spaces Water Conservation & Rebates: Water Sense toilets that meets strict EPA flushing guidelines, including using at least 20 percent less water than 1. 6-gallon toilets. A high-efficiency 1. 28-gallon flush offers up to 16500 gallons of water savings per year (versus a 3. 5-gallon toilet): 5 year limited on porcelain parts against fading/staining of the glaze; 1 Year on flushing mechanism & soft closing toilet seat Certification: UPC & CSA, High-efficiency, Water Sense Certified toilet - meet or exceed ANSI Z124. 1 & ANSI A112-19. 7About Woodbridge specializes in selling high quality kitchen and bathroom products since 2005. We are committed to providing each customer with the highest standard of customer service and best value products. Please don't hesitate to contact us if you have any questions or concerns. Customer Service Phone: 562-229-0088.

Toilet dimensions – 28.5”D x 14.5” W x 27.5” H | Rough opening – 12” | Voltage – 110V | Floor to seat height – 16.5” | MaP Score – 1000 g
ADA Compliant Toilet | US & Canada UPC & CSA certified products. High-efficiency, Water Sense Certified toilet - meet or exceed ANSI Z124. 1 & ANSI A112-19. 7
